-  PATCH /v1/appEventScreenshots/{id} 

Web Service Endpoint# PATCH /v1/appEventScreenshots/{id}

App Store Connect API 1.7+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-appEventScreenshots-_id_#url)



```
PATCH https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appEventScreenshots/{id}
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-appEventScreenshots-_id_#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required)
